Portfolio

Track Jams

Track Jams is a streaming music player that uses AngularJs and Buzz audio library. It is a responsive website as well.

Omnifood

Omnifood is a fictional food delivery service. Omnifood is responsive and uses CSS3 for some helpful animations. I used grid.css, waypoints.css, animate.css, and jquery.

CJR Books

CJR Books uses AngularJS and Bootstrap to showcase an author's books

Mark-it-off

Mark-it-off is a to-do list that uses Firebase API and AngularJS to create tasks with an expiration date. The styling of the website is using Google fonts, Font Awesome, and custom CSS.
